title: 'goa Aims To Make Tourism Tech Destination Offering Sun, Sea, Sand And Software' | Mint - Mint
content: 'goa Aims To Make Tourism Tech Destination Offering Sun, Sea, Sand And Software' | Mint  Mint
description: Rohan Khaunte, who is also information technology, and printing and stationary minister of Goa, said Sun, sea, sand and software are something the state government is trying to sell to promote the tourism-tech concept.
